import React, {useState} from 'react' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' import FarmerHarvestPhotos from "./FarmerHarvestPhotos" import FarmerHarvestList from "./FarmerHarvestList" import HarvestPublishing from "./HarvestPublishing" export default function FarmersHarvestPage() { let offsetX, offsetY const move = e => { const el= e.target el.style.left = `${e.pageX-offsetX}px` el.style.top = `${e.pageY-offsetY}px` } const add = e => { const el=e.target offsetX=e.clientX-el.getBoundingClientRect().left offsetY=e.clientY-el.getBoundingClientRect().top el.addEventListener('mousemove', move) } const remove = e => { const el=e.target el.removeEventListener('mousemove', remove) } return( <>

Harvest Image Search

 ) }
